```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns
```

## Word Entropy


### Baseline

```{python}
baseline_file = 'alignment_entropy/WordEntropy/baseline.csv'
baseline = pd.read_csv(baseline_file, header=None)
print('number of entropies:', len(baseline))
baseline[1] = np.log(1 + baseline[0])
print('median: ', baseline.median(axis=0))
baseline[0].plot(kind='kde')
```

## Box Plot

```{python}
box_plot_df = pd.DataFrame(columns=['baseline', 'h1', 'h2', 'h1h2', 'm1'])
```

```{python}
box_plot_df['baseline'] = baseline[0]
box_plot_df['h1'] = h1[0]
box_plot_df['h2'] = h2[0]
box_plot_df['h1h2'] = h1h2[0]
box_plot_df['m1'] = m1[0]
```

```{python}
box_plot_df.median(axis=0)
```

```{python}
fig, axes = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 6), nrows=1, ncols=1, sharey=True)
entropy_box_plot = sns.boxplot(data = box_plot_df, whis=1, fliersize=0.5, color='white', orient='h') 
```

```{python}
entropy_box_plot_fig= entropy_box_plot.get_figure()
entropy_box_plot_fig.savefig('berkeley_alignment_entropy_boxplot.pdf')
```
